item.description:
FRIDAY, JUNE 24, at the Dedham Hilton Hotel Grand Ballroom, 25 Allied Drive, Dedham. (781)329-7900.

Exit 14, East St., off Rte. 128/95. Take second right off rotary.

www.se-4u.com

Free door prizes, raffles, and dance music by award-winning DJ, 8:30-12 AM.

HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES 35-60 y.o.

Cost is $13.

Business-casual attire is acceptable; dress shirts & slacks; no jeans or sneakers.

Call (781)446-0234 for info.

Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club and The Single CEO’s Club.

 

If you've come to our dances before, bring a NEW friend and your guest will be admitted FREE.

***************************************************************************

Check out our biggest event of the year...our 15th annual Boston Harbor Hawaiian Luau Harbor Cruise. See details at www.se-4u.com...click on EVENTS.
item.how_to_find_us: Dedham Hilton Hotel Grand Ballroom, 25 Allied Drive, Dedham. (781)329-7900. Exit 14, East St. off Rte.128/95. Take second right off rotary.
item.name: "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
